name: Related Celebrities 04 Quiz | Celebrities Mixture | 5 Questions

questions.text: I was married to Dennis Hopper for a very short time in 1970. I was, also, a member of the Mamas and The Papas. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Michelle Phillips.

	Prior to that marriage, I was married to John Phillips.

questions.text: What is the name of the 1980s/1990s group that sang 'Hold On'?
questions.explanation:
Wilson Phillips.

	Two of them are sisters.

questions.text: Who is the daughter of John Phillips, and the step-daughter of Michelle Phillips, that suffered a series of set backs to do her drug addiction?
questions.explanation:
Mackenzie Phillips & Mackenzie.

	This former 'One Day At A Time' star is now clean and sober.

questions.text: The daughter of John Phillips and Michelle Phillips, that suffered a series of set backs to do her drug addiction: her half-sister is married to William (Billy) Baldwin. This singer from Wilson Phillips is ___________ ?
questions.explanation:
Chynna Phillips & Chynna.

	Billy and Chynna had a daughter in early 2000, a son in 2002 and a daughter in 2004 (Jameson, Vance and Brooke).

questions.text: Who are the two members of Wilson Phillips whose dad is Brian Wilson?
questions.correct: Carnie Wilson & Wendy Wilson & Carnie Wendy & Wendy Carnie & Wendy & Carnie
questions.explanation:
Carnie Wilson & Wendy Wilson & Carnie Wendy & Wendy Carnie & Wendy & Carnie.

	They are the other two members of Wilson Phillips. Their dad is Brian Wilson from 'The Beach Boys'.
